data.text: @pwsimerimiaw @janestevenson68 I know, I'm one of them!

@JaneJohnsonBakr @janestevenson68 There are ways around it,most are finding how to keep themselves safe while continuing with most of their lives.Please remember there are about two million still shielding.They have no choice, as each relaxation of restrictions has never given them a window to enjoy normal things
@JaneJohnsonBakr @janestevenson68 Like bullying, shed light and exposure on those who show selfishness and disrespect of others. Name and shame.  That's the way to stop the spread.
@pwsimerimiaw @janestevenson68 Exactly. You'd think a degree of self preservation would kick in...

@janestevenson68 @JaneJohnsonBakr The virus will always be 7 steps ahead of us. We may be tired of it but if we forget it will steal a loved one. Death rate are still very high. A million & a half including children with long covid, which can also kill. It's up to us, as families, to insist on our safety.
